name: Protegrity Data Tokenization
description: Tokenizes structured plain text data from GCS or Pub/Sub and ingests it to BigTable or BigQuery

parameters.name: bigQueryDataSchemaGCSPath
parameters.label: GCS location of your BigQuery data schema
parameters.helpText: (Optional) Path to data schema (JSON format) in GCS compatible with BigQuery

parameters.name: gcsBucket
parameters.label: GCS input bucket
parameters.helpText: GCS bucket to read data from

parameters.name: gcsPath
parameters.label: GCS input path
parameters.helpText: GCS path in bucket to read data from

parameters.name: pubsubTopic
parameters.label: Pub/Sub input topic
parameters.helpText: The Cloud Pub/Sub topic to read from

parameters.name: bigTableProjectId
parameters.label: Id of the project with output BigTable instance
parameters.helpText: Id of the project where the Cloud BigTable instance to write into is located

parameters.name: bigTableInstanceId
parameters.label: Id of the output BigTable instance
parameters.helpText: Id of the Cloud BigTable instance to write into

parameters.name: bigTableTableId
parameters.label: Id of the output BigTable table
parameters.helpText: Id of the Cloud BigTable table to write into

parameters.name: bigTableKeyColumnName
parameters.label: Key column name for the output BigTable table
parameters.helpText: Column name to use as a key in Cloud BigTable

parameters.name: bigQueryTableName
parameters.label: Name of the output BigQuery table
parameters.helpText: Cloud BigQuery table name to write into

parameters.name: dsgUri
parameters.label: URI of the DSG
parameters.helpText: URI for the API calls to DSG

parameters.name: batchSize
parameters.label: Size of the batch
parameters.helpText: Size of the batch to send to DSG per request

parameters.name: payloadConfigGcsPath
parameters.label: GCS path to the payload config
parameters.helpText: GCS path to the payload configuration file
